content.title: SIS' challenge to fatwa ruling to be heard in March - Free Malaysia Today
content.desc: This after the Federal Court ordered for the challenge to be heard in the High Court.

content.title: March 13 court date for SIS' challenge against fatwa labelling it 'deviant' - The Star Online
content.desc: KUALA LUMPUR: The High Court will hear a suit filed by Sisters in Islam (SIS) Forum (Malaysia) challenging a Selangor Fatwa Committee decision to label the organisation as "deviant". Selangor Islamic Religious Council's (Mais) lawyer Majdah Muda told reporters the date after meeting High Court (Appellate and Special Powers) judge Justice Nordin Hassan in chambers Thursday (Dec 6). Majdah said the court would decide whether a civil court has the jurisdiction to hear the judicial review application relating to fatwa (religious edicts). On Sept 25, the Federal Court's seven-man panel chaired b...
